code: import React from'react';import'../css/modal.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const options=['uppercase','lowercase','digit','specialCharacter','length'];const labels={'uppercase':'At least 1 uppercase letter','lowercase':'At least 1 lowercase letter','digit':'At least 1 digit','specialCharacter':'At least 1 special character (!@#$%^&*())','length':'At least 8 characters long'};const Modal=_ref=>{let{isOpen,onClose,selectedOptions,handleCheckboxChange}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal ".concat(isOpen?'open':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"modal-content",onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"close",onClick:onClose,children:"\xD7"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Password Criteria"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"settings_dropdown",children:options.map(option=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{onClick:e=>e.stopPropagation(),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:option,type:"checkbox",checked:selectedOptions.includes(option),onChange:()=>handleCheckboxChange(option)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:option,children:labels[option]})]},option))})]})});};export default Modal;
